content.description: Like most of the problems at SFSP the crux comes at the start. Lay back and pull hard to get to the crimpy side pull. Then use the side pulls to climb the face to the boulder top out.
content.protection: Bring a static rope and the good cedar trees to tie off to on the top.
content.location: Just to the right around corner of Fat Boy Strikes Back.

content.description: Pull on good holds through the short section of hanging block limestone. Work your way onto the face and use pockets and edges to make your way to the top
content.location: 5 feet to the right of Beguile

content.description: The low angle sport route on the left side of the gully. Climb the short face to gain a small ledge. Use great jugs as you lead up and into the upper face to eventually clip the anchor.

climbs.name: Foudre de minuit de Saint-François (Midnight Lightning)

content.description: Pull hard on good pockets. Then dance through the dishes with nice pinches. The white streak, and everything to it's right, is off. Fun, but short.
content.location: 7 feet left of Fat Boy Strikes Back. White Streak & everything to the right of it is off.

content.description: Start 7 ft left of Waiting Room. Use right/downward facing sidepull on right side, then angle left following the natural rock curvature. Small holds, couple of good crimps, and solid footwork practice. Tops out to the right of "Fat Boy Strikes Back" top out.
content.protection: Natural Anchors up top for TR.
content.location: Go to Overlook Wall.  To the right of Fat Boy Strikes Back.  7 feet to the left of the Waiting Room start point.  Angles up and left from start position.

content.description: The crux is the start of the route then smear and stem your way to the top in the small dihedral.
content.protection: Highball boulder or set  a top rope off the trees up top.
content.location: One of the first routes you come to on the overlook wall. Kind of a mini dihedral.

content.description: Climb the column of brittle, white rock. Layback the short cracks & center jug. Then find the rim of the helmet and use it.
content.location: 20 feet left of Foudre de minuit de Saint-François. 15 feet to the right of Recovery.

content.description: Start on edges and use pockets to reach good jugs. From here pul up and stand on jugs. Follow the bolts to the top.
content.location: 30 feet to the right of the roof crack.

content.description: Starts with some balancy moves on small holds. Then climb the face to a strong move to top out on the over hang at the top.
content.protection: There are good cedar trees to tie off to on top.
content.location: Bad Mouth is the route to the furthest right on the Overlook Wall.

content.description: This wall is perched atop a large ledge system, and overlooks the parking lot
